pages.text: This clock, made up of witnesses to time, is intended to guide you through this never-ending stream of beginnings and endings - the phases of the moon.$(br2)$(br2)$(italic)If we shadows have offended, Know but this and all is mended.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)That you have but slumbered here, While these visions did appear.$(br)And this weak and idle theme, No more yielding, but a dream.
